head.title: Search electronic signatures in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Utilize the robust capabilities of the {{ProdFullName}} API to efficiently search and retrieve signatures embedded in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, including PDFs, Word, Excel, Presentations, and Images.

header.title: Effortlessly search for electronic signatures in {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: Seamlessly extract a comprehensive list of electronic signatures embedded across various formats like PDFs, Word, Excel, Presentations, and Images, all powered by {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Explore {{ProdFullName}} capabilities
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) delivers cutting-edge functionality for digital document signing. With support for over 60 file formats, including PDFs, MS Office documents, Images, and ZIP files, it allows you to add, search, verify, modify, or remove various signatures, such as text, images, barcodes, QR codes, digital certificates, and stamps.

more_features.title: Complete document signing ecosystem
more_features.description: Discover an advanced, feature-rich document signing solution, specifically designed to enhance and secure your documents with multiple signature types across various formats.

feature_1.title: Sign and secure business documents
feature_1.content: Add digital signatures to any position within a document. {{ProdShortName}} supports an array of signature types, including text, images, barcodes, metadata, stamps, and digital certificates, ensuring document authenticity and compliance.

feature_2.title: Comprehensive signature management
feature_2.content: After signing, leverage the search feature to retrieve all embedded signatures. Modify or delete signatures as needed, providing you with complete control over document integrity.

feature_3.title: Safeguard your document's integrity
feature_3.content: Utilize advanced tools to manage hidden metadata embedded within documents. Add or remove metadata entries and apply corporate digital certificates to protect against unauthorized edits and ensure document authenticity.

formats.title: Retrieve signatures from a variety of file formats
formats.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API empowers you to extract and manage signatures from a wide array of document types. Effortlessly retrieve embedded signatures from all major file formats for further analysis or processing.

operations.title: Core functionalities
operations.description: Our API offers extensive flexibility, enabling users to sign documents and conduct comprehensive post-signing operations, such as searching, verifying, and modifying signatures.

examples.comment_2: Create an instance of {{TextSearchOptions}} to encompass all pages
examples.comment_3: Execute a search to identify any text-based signatures in the document
examples.comment_4: Compile a list of detected signatures for detailed examination
